src.java.documentReader

Class XMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.documentReader.XMLReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentReader

    public class XMLReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements DocumentReader
    An implementation of a DocumentReader with the purpose of reading files in XML format. This class uses a SAXParser for file parsing.
    Since:
    09-27-2017
    See Also:
    XML

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLReader(DefaultCorpusXMLHandler xmlHandler)
      Constructs a XMLReader object and initializes a SAXParser using a DefaultCorpusXMLHandler.

      void open(java.io.File file)
      Loads a file to be processed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLReader

        public XMLReader(DefaultCorpusXMLHandler xmlHandler)
          throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                 org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs a XMLReader object and initializes a SAXParser using a DefaultCorpusXMLHandler.
        Parameters:
        xmlHandler - An handler for dealing with the relevant document tags.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - An exception that can occur while instantiating the parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - An exception that can occur while instantiating the parser.
